text: Extra-sensory perception (ESP) is being able to know things without using the recognized physical senses. The study of extra-sensory perception is part of parapsychology. Almost all scientists think of it as pseudoscience. ==Related pages== *Telepathy ==References== ==Other websites== * * Extrasensory Perception at Video HQ * Online Chat Psychics Category:Occult Category:Pseudoscience
title: Extra-sensory perception
